keyword.name: afterAll
keyword.description: Run function after all functions finish running in the background.

keyword.name: afterEach
keyword.description: Run function after each function finish running in the background.

keyword.name: backgroundPool
keyword.description: Environment for running nelson's code in the background.

keyword.name: cancel
keyword.description: Stop function running in the background.

keyword.name: cancelAll
keyword.description: Stop all functions running in the background.

keyword.name: fetchNext
keyword.description: Retrieve next unread outputs from FevalFuture array.

keyword.name: fetchOutputs
keyword.description: Retrieve results from function running in the background pool.

keyword.name: wait
keyword.description: Wait for futures to be completed.
